description.zh-cn: 原名张道庸，中国人民解放军海军创始人和主要领导人之一，曾任海军副司令员兼东海舰队司令员，中国人民解放军中将。在文化大革命初期非正常死亡。
description.en: Original name Zhang Daoyong, one of the founders and main leaders of the People's Liberation Army Navy. He served as Deputy Commander of the Navy and Commander of the East Sea Fleet, and was a lieutenant general in the PLA. He died under mysterious circumstances at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 陶勇的妻子，在陶勇死后不久于1967年9月被迫害致死。
description.en: Wife of Tao Yong, she was persecuted to death in September 1967, shortly after Tao Yong's death.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的培养军事和政治干部的学校。陶勇在西路军失败后曾在此学习。
description.en: A school established by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War to train military and political cadres. Tao Yong studied here after the defeat of the Western Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 陶勇的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Tao Yong.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。他为原名张道庸的陶勇改名为“陶勇”。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, and a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He changed Tao Yong's original name from Zhang Daoyong to 'Tao Yong'.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，期间陶勇及其妻朱岚被迫害致死。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which Tao Yong and his wife Zhu Lan were persecuted to death.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军东海舰队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，陶勇曾长期担任其司令员。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy. Tao Yong served as its commander for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的海上武装力量，陶勇曾任其副司令员。
description.en: The naval branch of the People's Liberation Army. Tao Yong once served as its deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，文化大革命期间被定为毛泽东的接班人。陶勇在文革初期曾公然对抗其领导的政治集团。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, designated as Mao Zedong's successor during the Cultural Revolution. Tao Yong openly opposed the political faction led by him in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾在1966年底通过陈丕显提醒陶勇警惕政治风向的变化。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who, at the end of 1966, warned Tao Yong about the changing political climate through Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，在文革中被打倒。陶勇在死前曾与人商议营救他。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Communist Party of China who was overthrown during the Cultural Revolution. Before his death, Tao Yong had discussed rescuing him.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾是陶勇的战友。在文革初期，他曾劝说陶勇去南京养病以避开政治风波。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army and a comrade-in-arms of Tao Yong. In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, he advised Tao Yong to go to Nanjing to recuperate and avoid the political turmoil.

description.zh-cn: 时任东海舰队政委，在陶勇死后宣布其为“畏罪自杀”。
description.en: Then Political Commissar of the East Sea Fleet, who declared Tao Yong's death a 'suicide to escape punishment'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军海军政委，将陶勇的死定性为“畏罪自杀”。
description.en: Then Political Commissar of the PLA Navy, who characterized Tao Yong's death as a 'suicide to escape punishment'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。1977年为陶勇夫妇平反昭雪。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China. In 1977, it posthumously exonerated Tao Yong and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中国人民解放军渡江战役期间，英国皇家海军远东舰队紫石英号护卫舰与中国人民解放军发生的军事冲突。当时陶勇指挥了对英舰的炮击。
description.en: A military conflict between the British Royal Navy frigate HMS Amethyst and the Chinese People's Liberation Army during the PLA's Yangtze River Crossing Campaign in 1949. Tao Yong commanded the shelling of the British ship at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，在淮海战役中被陶勇所在的华东野战军俘虏。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the Republic of China Army, captured by the East China Field Army, which Tao Yong was part of, during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 英国的海上武装力量。在紫石英号事件中与陶勇指挥的解放军部队发生冲突。
description.en: The naval warfare force of the United Kingdom. It clashed with PLA forces commanded by Tao Yong during the Amethyst Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军将领，陶勇接替他担任东海舰队司令员。
description.en: A naval commander of the PLA. Tao Yong succeeded him as the commander of the East Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设的七个大军区之一，陶勇曾兼任其副司令员。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army. Tao Yong once served as its deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海警备区司令员，在陶勇去世当天上午曾与其谈论营救陈丕显事宜。
description.en: Then commander of the Shanghai Garrison Command, who on the morning of Tao Yong's death discussed the rescue of Chen Pixian with him.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在解放战争时期的主力部队之一，陶勇曾任其第4纵队司令员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Chinese Civil War. Tao Yong served as the commander of its 4th Column.

description.zh-cn: 朱岚是陶勇的妻子。
description.en: Zhu Lan was Tao Yong's wife.

description.zh-cn: 陶勇出生于安徽省霍邱县。
description.en: Tao Yong was born in Huoqiu County, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 1937年西路军失败后，陶勇进入抗日军政大学学习。
description.en: After the defeat of the Western Route Army in 1937, Tao Yong entered the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University for study.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅为原名张道庸的陶勇改名为“陶勇”。
description.en: Chen Yi changed Tao Yong's original name from Zhang Daoyong to 'Tao Yong'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命爆发后，陶勇遭到迫害，并于1967年1月21日非正常死亡。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Tao Yong was persecuted and died under mysterious circumstances on January 21, 1967.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，陶勇之妻朱岚被迫害致死。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Tao Yong's wife, Zhu Lan, was persecuted to death.

description.zh-cn: 陶勇自1955年10月起担任东海舰队司令员，直至去世。
description.en: Tao Yong served as the Commander of the East Sea Fleet from October 1955 until his death.

description.zh-cn: 陶勇曾担任中国人民解放军海军副司令员。
description.en: Tao Yong served as the Deputy Commander of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 陶勇自1963年11月起兼任南京军区副司令员。
description.en: Tao Yong concurrently served as the Deputy Commander of the Nanjing Military Region starting from November 1963.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，陶勇公然对抗林彪集团。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Tao Yong openly confronted the Lin Biao clique.

description.zh-cn: 1966年底，叶剑英通过陈丕显转告陶勇，提醒他警惕政治风向的变化。
description.en: At the end of 1966, Ye Jianying, through Chen Pixian, advised Tao Yong to be wary of the changing political winds.

description.zh-cn: 1967年初，许世友出于关心，要陶勇去南京养病以躲避政治风波。
description.en: In early 1967, out of concern, Xu Shiyou asked Tao Yong to go to Nanjing to recuperate and avoid the political turmoil.

description.zh-cn: 在去世当天上午，陶勇与廖政国谈论营救当时已被打倒的陈丕显。
description.en: On the morning of his death, Tao Yong discussed with Liao Zhengguo the rescue of Chen Pixian, who had already been overthrown.

description.zh-cn: 1967年1月21日上午，陶勇与时任上海警备区司令员廖政国会面，谈论营救陈丕显事宜。
description.en: On the morning of January 21, 1967, Tao Yong met with Liao Zhengguo, then commander of the Shanghai Garrison, to discuss the rescue of Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 在陶勇死后，时任东海舰队政委刘浩天立即宣布其为“畏罪自杀，抗拒运动”。
description.en: After Tao Yong's death, Liu Haotian, then Political Commissar of the East Sea Fleet, immediately declared his death a 'suicide to escape punishment and resist the movement'.

description.zh-cn: 时任海军政委李作鹏将陶勇的死定性为“畏罪自杀”。
description.en: Li Zuopeng, then the Political Commissar of the Navy, characterized Tao Yong's death as a 'suicide to escape punishment'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 1977年，中央军委为陶勇及其妻朱岚平反昭雪。
description.en: In 1977, the Central Military Commission posthumously exonerated Tao Yong and his wife Zhu Lan.

description.zh-cn: 在渡江战役期间，陶勇指挥部队炮击了闯入长江的英国皇家海军“紫石英”号，引发了紫石英号事件。
description.en: During the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign, Tao Yong commanded troops to shell the British Royal Navy's HMS Amethyst, which had entered the Yangtze River, triggering the Amethyst Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，陶勇所在的华东野战军参与围攻杜聿明集团，并最终将其生擒。
description.en: During the Huaihai Campaign, the East China Field Army, in which Tao Yong served, participated in the siege of the Du Yuming clique and eventually captured him alive.

description.zh-cn: 在紫石英号事件中，陶勇指挥的解放军部队与英国皇家海军发生军事冲突。
description.en: During the Amethyst Incident, PLA forces under Tao Yong's command engaged in a military conflict with the British Royal Navy.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，陶勇接替袁也烈，担任东海舰队司令员。
description.en: In 1955, Tao Yong succeeded Yuan Yelie as the commander of the East Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 1947年1月起，陶勇任华东野战军第4纵队司令员。
description.en: From January 1947, Tao Yong served as the Commander of the 4th Column of the East China Field Army.
